title: Don't drop your internet! - TP-Link Deco XE75
description: Thanks to TP-Link for sponsoring this video! Use code 30LINUS on both Amazon & TP-Link for $30 off your Deco XE75 or Deco XE75 Pro Deco XE75, 2-pack (Amazon):  Deco XE75, 2-pack (TP-Link):   Deco XE75 Pro, 2-pack (Amazon):  Deco XE75 Pro, 2-pack (TP-Link):   Getting a strong WiFi connection to your entire house can be tricky. But TP-Link is here to solve your problems with their Deco XE75 Wifi 6E mesh router.  Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:26 Wi-Fi 6E! 0:58 Unboxing 5:15 Setup 10:15 Speedtest 12:35 Conclusion
